jobDescription: Job Duties Capturing MI related data (market intelligence), providing and/or extracting specific numbers in NAND market with actionable insights (in report format)Supporting data analysis and communicating with HQ Requirements BS degree and/or a MBA5 plus market research experience in semiconductorWork experience in ‘market research’ or similar role with advanced knowledge of Excel, Word and PowerPointAbility to have a macro strategic view and state in figures important market changes.Ability to work cross functionally across various business unitStrong understanding of application market awareness in memory/semiconductor ecosystemWritten and verbal communication in English and Korean. SK hynix America
